paragraph.paragraph: This section of the EiffelEnvision documentation addresses the Eiffel for .NET language. The documentation contains guided tours and a introduction to Eiffel, which is essentially Eiffel for .NET. The Eiffel for .NET specifics are also discussed in detail.

../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/index.xml Eiffel for .NET Language
Getting started with the Eiffel for .NET language with all of the Eiffel conventions, reserved keywords and other constructs.
